ProxyType.title: Proxy Type
ProxyType.description: Use Manual for proxies that require authentication.

ProxyServer.title: Proxy Server
ProxyServer.description: The IP address or fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the proxy server.

ProxyServerPort.title: Proxy Server Port
ProxyServerPort.description: The port on which to connect to the proxy server.

ProxyUsername.title: Proxy Username
ProxyUsername.description: The user name for the proxy server.

ProxyPassword.title: Proxy Password
ProxyPassword.description: The authentication password for the proxy server.

ProxyPACURL.title: Proxy PAC URL
ProxyPACURL.description: The URL of the PAC file that defines the proxy configuration.

ProxyCaptiveLoginAllowed.title: Allow Proxy Bypass for Captive Portal Logins
ProxyCaptiveLoginAllowed.description: Allow the device to bypass the proxy server to display the login page for captive networks.
